types.name: Food
types.description: Food is a great way to make Road Runner stop so you can drop something on him.

types.name: Roadblocks
types.description: Blocking the road is a good way to stop Road Runner so you can drop something on him.

types.name: holes
types.description: if food and roadblocks don't stop Road Runner from running, try holes in the ground, from small to slow him to huge to stop him in his tracks.

types.name: Anvils
types.description: Anvils are traditional items to drop on Road Runner

types.name: Pianos
types.description: Every coyote should have a stash of pianos to drop on Road Runner with style and pinache.

types.name: Boulders
types.description: When traditional or stylish aren't meeting your needs, fall back on the old standby and drop a boulder on that pesky Road Runner.
